section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Services
section1.content: By using BeMatch services, you agree to these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these terms, you should not use our services.

section2.title: 2. Eligibility
section2.content: You must be at least 18 years old to use BeMatch. By using our services, you represent and warrant that you are 18 years of age or older.

section3.title: 3. Community Guidelines
section3.content: You must treat all users with respect. Harassment, hate speech, nudity, or illegal activities are not permitted. Violation of these rules may result in suspension or deletion of your account.

section4.title: 4. Disclaimer of Liability
section4.content: BeMatch is not responsible for your interactions with other users. You are responsible for your own safety. Be careful when sharing personal information.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: To create your profile, we collect information such as your name, email, date of birth, photos, and location. This information is used to provide you with better matches.

section2.title: 2. Use of Information
section2.content: Your information is used to provide, improve, and personalize our services. Your information is not shared with third parties for marketing purposes without your consent.

section3.title: 3. Data Security
section3.content: We take industry-standard security measures to protect your data. However, remember that no system is 100% secure.

q1.title: What is BeMatch Gold?
q1.content: BeMatch Gold is a premium subscription that allows you to see who likes you, get unlimited likes, and remove ads.

q2.title: How can I delete my account?
q2.content: To delete your account, you can go to the 'Privacy and Security' section in the 'Settings' menu. Note that this action is irreversible.

q3.title: How can I report a user?
q3.content: You can report inappropriate behavior to us by using the 'Report' option in a user's profile menu.
